title: Installation issue: llvm
body:
On Apollo 70 I get:

```

$ spack install llvm
==> Warning: Missing a source id for ncurses@6.2.20200212
==> Warning: Missing a source id for perl@5.26.3
[+] /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/libiconv-1.16-h4ll3hvdaz7gfwe765lzt6pl4ww4ohbr
==> pkgconf@1.4.2 : externally installed in /usr
[+] /usr
[+] /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/xz-5.2.5-y76nfq3cc4bbself2oh5ioaoipjs7cwu

==> ncurses@6.2.20200212 : externally installed in /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/ncurses-6.2-7xhgd5vjg7xqkliicy5swm46kgjf7myr

[+] /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/cmake-3.17.3-56vhyeivevxp3gpxte6vnyrv2l4bzvnq
==> libtool@2.4.6 : externally installed in /usr
[+] /usr
[+] /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/util-macros-1.19.1-yetp5u4pp47qak3df5rhp6wvkixcib24

[+] /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/tar-1.32-errdrd4k467b7f7layrh3d34xx5zuqm2
[+] /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/libxml2-2.9.10-blsvvhn3yrdnkoek3er3iafra33hwhtz

[+] /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/libpciaccess-0.16-prjhez2g2uyx3pcvdld2lyylyth6ilol

==> No binary for perl-data-dumper found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/69/697608b39330988e519131be667ff47168aaaaf99f06bd2095d5b46ad05d76fa.tar.gz
==> perl-data-dumper: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> perl-data-dumper: Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'

4 errors found in build log:
     12    chmod 644 "Dumper.bs"

           s blib/arch/auto/Data/Dumper/Dumper.bs 644

           _FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -g   -DVERSION=\"2.173\" -DXS_VERSION=\"2.173\"
            -fPIC "-I/usr/lib64/perl5/CORE"  -DUSE_PPPORT_H Dumper.c

  >> 21    {standard input}:63982: Error: unknown pseudo-op: `.attach_to_group'
     22    make: *** [Makefile:330: Dumper.o] Error 1

See build log for details:

==> Warning: Skipping build of llvm since perl-data-dumper failed

[+] /home/users/itaru.kitayama/projects/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-thunderx2/gcc-8.3.1/binutils-2.35-pgc6pxyzd3yidx6a5hvhnemcf3t7n5ei
```
